jobDescription: Job Description: We are seeking an outstanding Data Scientist to solve challenging problems in the area of data, which include big data analytics, deep learning, machine learning, data mining, text mining and others. The successful candidate will have an opportunity to work with real world problems in Pharmaceutical and Life Sciences industries through customer PoCs in our AI innovation center and create appropriate solutions.  The ideal candidate should be able to identify a business problem through customer meetings, reformulate it to a data science problem, select sources of data, and conduct the analysis that would deliver value to the customer. Key Responsibilities:Collaborate with customers to design best data analytics solutions for various business problems.Understand customer data sources, integrates multiple sources or types of data, applies tools and pipelines to efficiently collect, clean, and prepare massive volumes of data for analysis.Apply innovative methods, algorithms and tools including deep learning and machine learning to extract value from the data.Validate methods, make recommendation on implementation including enhancement of data sourcesFamiliarity with underlying hardware architectures such as accelerators to scale data science problems for improving time to value.Present proposals and results to our business customers.The ideal candidate will possess the following experience:Expertise in deep learning, machine learning, graph analytics and text mining techniques, such as classification, regression, clustering, feature engineering, label propagation, PageRank, information extraction, topic modelling etc.Expert knowledge of data structures and algorithms.Strong programming skills in one or more in the following: Python and R.Experiences on one or more from the following: Deep learning, machine learning, graph analytics, natural language processing, recommendation system, predictive modelling.Experience in Wealth and Asset Management is a huge plus.provided by Dice Data Scientist, Data Analytics, Machine Learning
